Posts.Content: May 30, 2015 04:23AM stark_reactor wrote: A little more info...I hope this helps...I have a couple hard lumps that have not gone away underneath my right breast and some hard knots/lumps on my ribs below that spot. I also have had sharp pains in the middle of my chest, though doctors don't know why (heart doctors, lung doctors). Lastly, I have noticed a change in the skin on my nipples, particularly the right one, but also the left. I hope I'm not being paranoid, I just don't know why these weird things are happening to me. If you have any info, please let me know. Thank you so much.
